note.para: "References" describe where to find external documentation relevant to a subject.
"Notes" are tips, shortcuts or alternative approaches to the task at hand. Ignoring a note should have no negative consequences, but you might miss out on a trick that makes your life easier.

important.para: "Important" boxes detail things that are easily missed: configuration changes that only apply to the current session, or services that need restarting before an update will apply. Ignoring a box labeled "Important" will not cause data loss, but may cause irritation and frustration.

warning.para: "Warnings" should not be ignored. Ignoring warnings will most likely cause data loss.
